name: ProductPlan MCP Confusion Pairs
description: Tests for distinguishing commonly confused ProductPlan tools

pairs.distinction: list_roadmaps returns all roadmaps (no ID needed). get_roadmap returns full details of one specific roadmap (ID required).

tests.prompt: What roadmaps do I have?
tests.rationale: Listing all roadmaps without specifying one

tests.prompt: Show all my roadmaps
Get the settings for roadmap 12345
tests.rationale: Requesting details for a specific roadmap

tests.prompt: What are the details of roadmap abc?

pairs.distinction: get_roadmap returns roadmap metadata and settings. get_roadmap_bars returns the bars (items) planned on the roadmap.

tests.prompt: Show me roadmap 123 settings
What's the configuration of roadmap abc?
What items are planned on roadmap 123?
Show me the work planned on the Q1 roadmap

pairs.distinction: get_bar returns details of one bar. get_bar_children returns nested sub-items under a parent bar.

tests.prompt: Show me details of bar 456
What is the description of this roadmap item?
What sub-items are under bar 789?
Show nested tasks for this bar

pairs.distinction: get_bar_comments reads existing comments. manage_bar_comment adds a new comment.

tests.prompt: Show me the comments on bar 123
What feedback has been left on this item?
Add a comment to bar 456
Leave feedback on this roadmap item

pairs.distinction: get_bar_connections reads existing dependencies. manage_bar_connection creates or deletes dependencies.

tests.prompt: What dependencies does bar 123 have?
Show me what this bar is linked to
Create a dependency from bar A to bar B
Remove the dependency between bars

pairs.distinction: get_bar_links reads external URLs attached to a bar. manage_bar_link adds, updates, or removes links.

tests.prompt: What links are attached to bar 789?
Show me the Jira tickets linked to this item
Add a Jira link to bar 123
Remove the documentation link from this bar

pairs.distinction: list_ideas shows raw feedback/ideas. list_opportunities shows validated ideas that have been promoted.

tests.prompt: Show all customer feedback
What ideas have been submitted?
What validated ideas are we pursuing?
Show me the opportunities in the pipeline

pairs.distinction: list_objectives returns all OKRs. get_objective returns full details including key results for one objective.

tests.prompt: What are our strategic goals?
Show me all OKRs
Get details of objective 123
What are the key results for the Q1 revenue objective?

pairs.distinction: manage_bar operates on roadmap items (bars). manage_lane operates on swim lanes that organize bars.

tests.prompt: Create a new item called 'API v2' on the roadmap
Delete the 'Mobile App' bar
Add a new lane called 'Infrastructure'
Rename the 'Backend' lane to 'Platform'

pairs.distinction: manage_idea creates/updates raw ideas. manage_opportunity manages validated opportunities.

tests.prompt: Create a new idea from customer feedback
Update the status of idea 456
Create a new opportunity for enterprise expansion
Delete opportunity 789
